item.title: Docker network - complete guide
item.description: Containers need to communicate with each other and outside world. Docker has wide network capabilities. What we can do with docker network? How to use it? Docker Network Theory What elements we have in docker network? CNM libnetwork drivers Docker network concept is based on open-source design specification called Container Network Model(CNM). CNM assume that network drivers should be pluggable. Docker CNM implementation is in libnetwork library. What we can do with docker CNM?
